title._content: Image taken from page 89 of 'The Fens and Floods of Mid-Lincolnshire. With a description of the River Witham ... and its improvements up to 1825. With maps, etc'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Fens and Floods of Mid-Lincolnshire. With a description of the River Witham ... and its improvements up to 1825. With maps, etc" Author: Padley, James Sandby. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10368.k.15." Page: 89 Place of Publishing: Lincoln Date of Publishing: 1882 Publisher: C. Akrill Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002745839 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
